alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston; Ontario; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 9:31PM EST until January 29 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches across the higher terrain, and 1 to 3 inches in the valleys and lower elevations. * WHERE...Wyoming, Livingston, Ontario, and Allegany counties. The greater snow amounts will focus across higher terrain, with lower accumulations in the valleys. * WHEN...From 7 AM Sunday to 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered, slippery road conditions along with reduced visibility. This will be a very wet, slushy snow which will weight down trees and powerlines and may result in isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
